channel.title: Comments on: 1 Billion Queries Per Minute – MySQL Cluster 7.2 is GA!
channel.description: Database technologies - especially around scalability and High Availability

item.title: By: Deva Kishore
item.dc:creator: Deva Kishore
item.description:
This is amazing !I Liked the NoSQL Interface provided with MySQL Cluster was waiting for this feature.
I will call it MySQL Cloudster :)
Cheers,Kishore Telapalli
item.content:encoded:

item.title: By: admin

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/mysql-cluster/1-billion-queries-per-minute-mysql-cluster-7-2-is-ga#comment-575">Johan Andersson</a>.
Hi Johan,
we're looking into it.
Cheers, Andrew.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Johan Andersson.

Hi Johan,

we’re looking into it.

Cheers, Andrew.

item.title: By: Johan Andersson
item.dc:creator: Johan Andersson
item.description:
This is great news! Well done.
When will you put all the Oracle Linux 6 RPMs on the download page? Looks like most of the 32-bit RPMs are there, but most of the 64-bits are missing. Hence not possible to install.
BR johan
item.content:encoded:
This is great news! Well done.

When will you put all the Oracle Linux 6 RPMs on the download page? Looks like most of the 32-bit RPMs are there, but most of the 64-bits are missing. Hence not possible to install.

BR
johan
